content:
utayon naathaa, giriseenaa nin sa-
nnidhiyinkal thulli; malayum katalum perum ni-
nne kanyaka garbhe peri,
aval garbhiniyaayaashcharya-tthaaltthanne pettaal ninne;
valuthaakkeetanamaval thannormma.

kaadeeshanmaar jeevanum raajya-
tthinumavakaashakkaar; mashihaaye snehicchore-
thinu yogyanmaaraa bhaagyam
kaathukalaal kettittille, kannukalaal kandittille,
ille chitthe kalpicchittum.

maamodeesaa - moolam mashihaa than
rooshmaa kutthappettum than gaathram bhakshicchum,
than raktham paanam cheythor
thaan moolam jeevan poondi-poozhiyathil ninningeree-
ttaniyum nal mahimaavinnanki.

1. Maathaa kaadeeshanmaar than praarththanayaal
arulatiyaarkkum mrutharaayorkkum punyam.

2. Vaazhvaayu theeraname mariyaaminnormma
aval praarththana aathmaakkalkkaayum kotta.

3. Nibiyanmaar shleehanmaar sahadenmaare!
Njangalkkaayu krupa yaachippeenellaarum.

4. Nin sharanatthaal mrutharaam bhraathrupithrukkal
melaanandappanineer nee veezhtthanam.

6. Maathaa kaadeeshanmaar than praarththanayaal
arulatiyaarkkum punyam mrutharaayorkkum.
vaayanakkaaran:- “neethimaanmaarute kootaaratthil mahatthuvatthinteyum rakshayuteyum shabdam" ennu daaveedu mukhaa ntharam parishuddharoohaa paati.
